main

Class Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Effect

  • public class Effect
extends java.lang.Object
    This class sets and creates the effects which are needed for the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Effect(java.lang.String e)
      This constructor allows the construction of the effect which is named and passed into the constructor.
      Effect(java.lang.String e, int timeLeft)
      This constructor gets the name of the effect and how long the effect should last .

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decreaseTime()
      This method checks if the effect is timed this method allows the time to decrease.
      java.lang.String getEffectName()
      This method gets the effect name.
      int getTime()
      This gets the amount of time remaining for the effect.
      boolean isAreaFree(BoardSquare foo)
      This method checks if the area where the effect is about to be played on is free and an effect can be played there.
      boolean isTimed()
      This method returns true or false if the effect is timed.
      void removeTime()
      This removes the effect once the time has expired.
      void setBacktrack(Player player)
      This sets the effect to a backtrack, this means that the player can move back a space.
      void setDoubleMove(Player p)
      This sets the effect of a double move, this allows the player to move twice.
      void setFire(BoardSquare targetTile, Player p)
      This sets the functionality of the fire effect,this uses a target main.tile to add negative effect to the 3x3 grid.
      void setIce(BoardSquare targetTile)
      This method is used to set the effct of ice, this sets the effect to a 3x3 grid on the game board.
      void setTime()
      This method sets the amount of time that the effect will be in play.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Effect

        public Effect(java.lang.String e)
        This constructor allows the construction of the effect which is named and passed into the constructor.
        Parameters:
        e - The name of the effect which is being added to the board.

      • Effect

        public Effect(java.lang.String e,
              int timeLeft)
        This constructor gets the name of the effect and how long the effect should last .
        Parameters:
        e - the effect type.
        timeLeft - The amount of time the effect should last.

    • Method Detail

      • getEffectName

        public java.lang.String getEffectName()
        This method gets the effect name.
        Returns:
        The effect name

      • isTimed

        public boolean isTimed()
        This method returns true or false if the effect is timed.
        Returns:
        If the effect is timed as a true or false.

      • setIce

        public void setIce(BoardSquare targetTile)
        This method is used to set the effct of ice, this sets the effect to a 3x3 grid on the game board.
        Parameters:
        targetTile - This is the target main.tile in the center of the 3x3 grid to set the effect in play.

      • setFire

        public void setFire(BoardSquare targetTile,
                    Player p)
        This sets the functionality of the fire effect,this uses a target main.tile to add negative effect to the 3x3 grid.
        Parameters:
        targetTile - The main.tile where the user wants the negative effect to occur , this is the center of the 3x3 grid.
        p - The player.

      • setDoubleMove

        public void setDoubleMove(Player p)
        This sets the effect of a double move, this allows the player to move twice.
        Parameters:
        p - The player, whose effect this is

      • setBacktrack

        public void setBacktrack(Player player)
        This sets the effect to a backtrack, this means that the player can move back a space.
        Parameters:
        player - The player, whose playing this effect.

      • isAreaFree

        public boolean isAreaFree(BoardSquare foo)
        This method checks if the area where the effect is about to be played on is free and an effect can be played there.
        Parameters:
        foo - This is the boardsquare where the effect will be played.
        Returns:
        if the area is free on the board return true.

      • setTime

        public void setTime()
        This method sets the amount of time that the effect will be in play.

      • decreaseTime

        public void decreaseTime()
        This method checks if the effect is timed this method allows the time to decrease.

      • getTime

        public int getTime()
        This gets the amount of time remaining for the effect.
        Returns:
        The amount of time remaining

      • removeTime

        public void removeTime()
        This removes the effect once the time has expired.
